eyata sambandha thawath ayeku niwase gas silindaraya pipiri gos in pilissi miyagiye tayar sayak seya.

yatama link eke thiyanawa wage deyakata ee kiyanne gowiyo boga dosthara kenekugen thunduwak liyawagena eekata mudalaligen thel beheth ganna wadakata ape gowiyo, (saha welendo )kamathiweyida kiyala soya balimak me dina wala rajarata paththe siddha wenawa .

owun noyekuth ath waradi karannata puluwana.

ee nisa hondin ranganaye yediya haki, ee kapakirima pilibanda wishwasaya thibiya haki nalu niliyanwa thora ganu labuwa.eeta amatharawa nalu niliyan sandaha shwasana abhyasa, handa ha wedikawa pariharanaya kirima pilibanda wenama prayogika wadasatahan pawathwuwa.natya nirmanayata, pera wedika natya naluwaku lesa pamini gaman maga sihipath kalahoth?kalawata piwisimedi mage mulma guruwaraya wuye aacharya salman fonseka.
eda ewani thaththwayak thibiyadith daruwan pasal yawimata hakiwuwanam ada nohakke ayi?

niya pela sindalayi datha panne thurulata gannata aadarayen dalipatha sindalayi kopula panne muwa sipa gannata aadarayen maw nathi yame ma ura mandale dethol howayi kiri suwanda soya dahadiya suwandak danuni da puthune deranata muhuwana numbaa wenuwen nidi nathi yame ma laya thurule kalum geneyi mudu sinaha papa unusum susumak danuni da puthune pawanata muhuwana numbaa wenuwen geya pada -sisira disanayaka sangithaya - jayantha rathnayaka piyanani ma nawatha upannoth...
wisi haya da ada ?
eeta hethuwi thibune pradhana le naharayaka awahirathawak."

kwontam bhauthika widyawehi yam gunayak nirikshanaya keri ehi prathibaddha agaya nirikshanaya keri nathi wita adala anshuwehi ho paddhathiyehi ho awasthawa, managena athi agayata ayath hilbat awakashaya namin handinwena daishika awakashayehi ayigan daishikaya yayi kiyanu labena daishikaya magin ho ee gunayehi prathibaddha gunayehi agayanta ayath ayigan daishikayan ge sanyojanayak magin ho nirupanaya kala haki ya.
me siddhiyata mulikaya wunu samanakkodi adikaramwa hisa gasa mara damannath mekata sambandha wunu moladande nilame pramukha anek radalayanwa ula thaba mara damannath rajathuma niyoga karanawa.
me siyallatama hethu bhutha wuye dhanapathi panthiye aththanomathika kriyakarakam.

ane puthe, mewa oyage ammata thaththata kiyanna epa.
tikat rupiyal 2500, 2000, 1500, saha 750 yanadi washayen mila kara atha.
thama charikawe winodabara, hagumbara, jolibara, chu bara thorathura...

nidasunak lesa, uthuru palath sabhawata polis balathala labunoth eya thrasthawadinta upakarayak wanu athayi sithiya no haki ya.

thama rakiyawa handunumpathe sandahan kirima awashya wanne nam eeta adala sewa sahathikaya da (masa 03 k athulatha laba gath), wruththiyamaya sudusukamlath aya ema sudusukam sanatha kirimata adala sahathika idiripath kala yuthuya.

dan men nowa mita kalakata pera dadawathe yana ballan aanduwen alla mara damini.

ema awasthawata engalanthaye sabhapathi – indika gunasekara,oostereliyawe pradhana sanwidhayaka – ranchith naranpanawa,kanadawe sabhapathi – warna hetiti aarachichi,lankawa niyochanaya karamin – dushanthi hapugoda,engalanthaya – manikmalidda,ithaliye – sanchiwa dodanthanna, sunil,indika gunasekara maha brithanya, lakshman barns pranshaya, ostreliyawa saha napoli milano romaya niyojanaya karamin athulu kandayamak sahabagi wi sitiya.
uda: miridiya saha karadiya malu , karawala , umbalakada , halmassn
man ahuwa leda ande hitiya mage thaththa danagaththa nam polisiya nodana hitiye kohomada kiyala.
me nisa rakiya pilibanda asahanayak athiwime awashyathawak naha kiyalayi mama hithanne.wishwawidyala shishyayan deshapalanaya kalata kamak naha.
eeth ithin wadi dura yanna atha denna ee kale kawuruth hitiye naha.
bas eke janele dige wathura berenawa, brek karana warayak pasa urahisata wathura bindu watenawa.
ewani niladharayak sampadanaya kota dena pranitha aahara panayen thela wati oda wadunu kuli balayekuge his olu gediya thulatath kalawata ana panawime chethanawa athulu wiya hakiya.
samma aajiwa deyakarayen wisthara wenawa.
eya kohomada kiyanne mama eyata ayithi kiyala.
dan anthimata yuda aparadhakaruwek.
ehidi paripurna sangitha puhunuwak labu me sangithagnyaya 1944 di perala diwayinata paminiyeya.

rajakariye yedi sitiyadi thuwala lada sebalekuta mewani sathkamak kala palamu awasthawa menma wrushana pasa saha ee awata udara pradeshaya athulath purna pataka kotasak baddha karana lada palamu awasthawada meya bawayi wides wartha penwa denne.
ohuge molayehi idiripasa kotasehi, his kabale bindi giya kotas saha unda kotas thanpathwa athi bawath, atham unda kotas molaya abhyantharayata kinda basa athi bawath, ehi sandahan wanawa.
emen ma sama pahapath kirima sadaha yodaganu labana samahara saban ha aalepana wargawala da rasadiya adangu wiya haki ya.
“ eeka thamayi amme math me kalpana kale..
bath bedala dunnama serama eka pimmata kagena giya.’’
math meka piligannawa :-
melo rahak nathi ayawayak.
anthimedi thawa porawal dekak ekkath indala dan rajarata loku manthriyek thiyan inne.
barlin nagaraya aashritha pradeshaya harunu wita, nagenahira jarmaniya, batahira jarmaniyata wada krushikarmika ratak wuyen mema wenaskam eratata nusudusu wiya.
eya thamayi che aar ta wiruddha wenne, "dharmishta samajaya" potha liyala.
kunatuwakata hasuwethayi biyen pala yamin siti rohinga muslimwarun ragath bottuwak perali yamen muhude di wipathata path hathalis denek bera gath bawa sahana sewakayo pawasathi.
amuthuyi ingrisi komadiyak kriyadama chithrapata wikramanwitha
ee magin siduwanne pa්rathichaka්rikaranaya kerena plastik drawyaya magin ghana plastik thiru nirmanaya kirimaya.
nawa kramaya athhada balaminma jita kanak labadime karyaya itha ikmanin arambaina.

ewita kamarawa noselwena lesa sthawara wa thaba gatha yuthu athara, kamarawa ma`da washayen ho selawunahoth, ee selawima da, rupa ramuwata hasuwana wasthun chalanaya wuwawahoth ee selawima da kamarawe sensaraya matha mana wa satahan weyi.
maraya udu rawula wawala inne.
ape kale nam wawula kiwwe sapotars walata...dan nam ithin komando inna thama kamathi...
'kawurunda numbaa mage' teli natyaya me dawaswala wikashaya wenawa.

japanaye jathika kridawa lesa salakena sumo kridawa shri lankawata handunwadimen pasu pawathwana lada dewani jathika sumo tharagawaliyedida pita pita dewani wathawatath pirimi anshaye dakshathama sumo kridakaya bawata pathwimata mathugama k...
eyath inne wenath thanaka.
apa miya giya mohothedima dewiyan wahansege winishchayata muhuna dimata siduwe (hebrew 9:27).
depalu karan dora piyan deka mama athulata giya....
boho awasthawaladi thanpath bawin yuthuwa kriya karayi.
dan ma rata wenuwen therimwalata sudanam.”ohu pakisthanaya wenuwen krida kirimata sudusuyi” pakisthana athuru pradhana therim niladhari mohamad iliyas pawasayi.

habayi koyi welawe hari kada watenawa.

kalayak yaddi api honda yaluwo widiyata hitiya. 10 wasaredi ra muttiyata gal gahana welaweth apith ekka indapu kithul gahata wandan hitiyeth eha panthiye hitapu thusitha.dhammika ada guruwarayeki.chamil wiyaparikayek sathurekugen paliganna hondama widiya thamayi ee sathura asarana wunu aawasthawakadi ohuta udawu kirima.athin payin paliganimata wada ee de wedanakari apith ee wedanawa winda.athdakimen kiyanne.
pariganaka gana hodama de danaganna hamadamath kanapitamat samagin radenna..
ruwandawe warthamana adikarana amathi mema daduwama hadinwuye yukthiye sandisthanayak lesayi.
eeka paththakin thiyanawa..

oowara dekakata pasuwa fowarng shot leghi siti kusal mendis rakagath agana udapanduwakin simbabwe pile sitina palapuruduma test pithikaruwa wana hamiltan masakangsa pitiyen iwath wana wita ohu laba sitiye lakunu 19 k pamani.

krikat tharaga pawadim ho wenath dushanayak gana kisidu kridakayekuta chodanawak mathaik jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaye dushana mardana eekakayen karana parikshanayen thahawuru wi nathayi palath sabha ha palath palana saha krida amathi fayisar mustha mahatha parlimenthuwedi eeye (10) prakasha kaleya.

katunayaka guwanthotupola aparadha parikshana departhamenthu niladharin mema sabhapathiwarayagen prashna kirimen anathuruwa, puththalama adhikaranaya wetha gos mema gataluwa wisa¼da ganima sandaha yomu kara thibe.
ee widum katu, alis katuwalata samana wu athara eewa samanyayen bhawitha kerenne redi ho dal wiwima sandahayi.
meya sinhalata ema naminma pariwarthanaya kara atha.
manda eeshrayal palakayin muslim thrasthawadaya hamuwe thama rata wayiyage aarakshawa patha niwatayin nowi eeta sarthakawa prathi prahara ella karana nisaya.
ema kandayama mulinma kale wathikana bankuwe katayuthu nawaman ganwa eya paradrushya aayathanayak bawata path kirimayi.
yuropa sangamaya yukrenayata tharjanaya karanawa – putin drawida sandhanayata erehiwa rajayen yuda aparadha chodana yuda aparadha gana wimarshanaya kala el salwadoraye en.ji.oo....
godak denek ahana prashnaya menna meka thamayi.
me hama dekatama tika tika api purudu wuna.
mekath therum aran naha, shabdawalata wada akuru gana

oya okkoma ee mohothe aawegaya ban...anek paththen ee wachana aragena baluwoth aagama, deshapalanaya wage dewal sambandha wiwechanath jiwithe aduru paththa ganath thama kiyanne...mama niragamika nowunath ewa rasawidinna mata eka badhawak nowe...
paththen athi pilika riban pachchaya ninditha penumak laba deyi kanthawanta pilika sandaha riban thintha aalepana riban toto duka mathakaya 19.
niwasata thira redi thoraganimedi salakilimath wiya yuthu karunu
bandumkara mudal gath mathi amathiwaru kawuda?
dewarakma lanka krikat palaka mandalaye sabhapathi dhuraya hebawimen ema kshethrayata sidu karana lada sewawada imahathya.

ee aramuna athiwayi aanandayen pagnyawata sangitha charikawa arambaune.
thawama sathiyayi wassane sanda thiragatha wela.
tongge wayasa awurudu 19 ki.
swarnadasa herathswarnadasa herath yana namaya kasat kshethraya ha bandunaki.
eeken apita hayiku gana apema ramuwak hadaganna puluwani.
hithe kuthuhalaya wadi wuna.
wasara 16 k indiyawa thula gathakala mohu erata boho thanwala sancharaya karana laddeki.
nogiyoth ennata wenne natha.
ikman gamanin aa sewakayek gettuwa wiwara kale hisa namagenaya.
ohu miyagiya bawa kroeeshiyawe madhya wartha kala namuth heg adhikaranaya pawasanne thamanta eya thahawuru kala nohaki bawaya.
pitakotuwa dewani haras widiye padika wedikawe wikinimata thaba thibu buduruwe sirasa mudranaya kalayi kiyana sariyak soya gath bawa polisiya kiyayi.
